data.title: Early Career Opportunities in North America
data.meta_description: Learn more about job opportunities for early career students and graduates in North America (NAM).
data.text:
Your story begins here.

Whether you're at the start of your career or looking to discover your next adventure, your story begins here.

We know you've worked hard for this opportunity and we value that. That's why we're committed to investing in new talent and supporting your growth and development from the start. You'll have extensive on-the-job training and exposure to senior leaders, as well as more traditional learning opportunities in both a structured classroom and virtual setting.

You'll find interns and graduates throughout Citi â and they're all helping us make progress happen. From New York City to around the world, at Citi, you'll perform work that has a real positive impact in the communities where we live and work. As one of the world's most global banks, we proudly offer the best experiences for our customers and employees in North America â which includes the U.S., Puerto Rico and Canada â and around the world.

Ready to join us? Take a look at our offerings to learn more, attend an event to hear what it's like to be part of the Citi team, or search for available student and graduate opportunities. We can't wait to meet you.

Opportunities in North America

In NAM, we offer programs in a number of business areas where you can make an impact.

Personal Banking and Wealth Management

U.S. Personal Banking

Be a part of the Personal Banking (PB) team serving millions of account holders across the world. Innovative technology, best-in-class trainings and limitless opportunity are here to help you shape the future of global banking.

Citi Global Wealth

We serve clients ranging from emerging wealth to the wealthiest individuals and their families as they seek to drive growth and progress through their businesses, investments and philanthropy. Join us and help enable our clients to shape the future.

Functions

Compliance

Everyone owns compliance risk. In Compliance, we help to make sure Citi is effectively managing its existing and emerging compliance risks to achieve the best outcomes for our clients, our stakeholders, and Citi as a whole.

Finance

Our Finance teams keep the whole bank on track. As part of our Finance team, you will have the opportunity to do work with an impact across the entire enterprise while mastering a specialization in planning, strategy and more.

Human Resources

Success is a team sport, especially at Citi. Starting a career with our Human Resources team will give you the opportunity to support our businesses around the world and develop your own skills.

Internal Audit

Want to ensure our key stakeholders and leaders have an independent assessment of Citi? Internal Audit does just that for key business areas at Citi, offering you the chance to master skills across the industry while gaining valuable experience and networking across the globe.

Risk Management

We value strategic thought leadership and strong analytical skills while promoting a diverse, collaborative, high performance culture to assist in our critical role of helping Citi identify, measure, monitor, and control risk and ensure Citi's long-term safety and soundness.

Enterprise Services and Public Affairs (ESPA)

Our ESPA team aims to enhance how our stakeholders perceive and experience Citi. We focus on two core activities: managing our reputation by engaging with our stakeholders and delivering great spaces and services to colleagues and clients.

Technology

Supporting our global team is a full-time job. In fact, it could be yours. Find a role with us in Technology supporting Citi's tools and programming while building new skills and growing your career.

Personal Banking & Wealth Management Technology

Our team sees Citi as a technology company with a banking license. Here you will power the digital transformation of Personal Banking & Wealth Management across the world and support Citi in being the best for our clients.

Enterprise Operations and Technology

Providing a strong technical and operational foundation enables Citi to achieve its day-to-day operations and its long-term growth goals.

Institutional Clients Group (ICG) Technology

Our team is on the forefront of innovation. Gain skills in software development and product support.

Operations

Operations enables our business to flow, making our business work on time and on target, in a world that demands lightning-fast transaction speeds, pinpoints execution accuracy and full visibility. To make this happen, our teams partner with external Clients, Sales, Trading and other internal departments to mitigate risk and deliver a best in class post execution service.

Institutional Clients Group

Banking, Capital Markets and Advisory (BCMA)

Capital Markets

As a part of our Capital Markets team, you'll get a hands-on experience serving our clients and developing your talents to help acquire capital for major business needs.

Corporate Banking

Looking for a career where you'll get to see the impact of your work directly every day? Look no further than Corporate Banking, where you'll deepen your industry knowledge alongside our team and get hands-on experience in a rewarding role.

Investment Banking

In Investment Banking, you'll be part of a team that impacts much more than one client or company. You'll enable clients to reach their financial goals and drive industry change by providing in-depth strategy and financial advice.

Strategic Training for Experienced Professionals

We are pleased to announce the launch of the Citi Strategic Training for Experienced Professionals Program within Banking, Capital Markets and Advisory (BCMA). This program is aimed at recruiting underrepresented professionals from backgrounds outside of institutional client advisory and capital markets. This is a unique opportunity for individuals interested in making a transition into the financial industry, and specifically into BCMA. The program will take participants through an exciting and intensive five-month training program to help develop the skills needed to be successful in banking. Following successful completion of the training, participants will have the opportunity to join an incoming Associate class.

Financial Resource Management (FRM)

This team exists to solve complex problems, concentrating on regulatory capital and liquidity management and efficiency opportunities to support the business strategy of Markets and Securities Services, and the larger Institutional Clients Group franchise.

In-Business Risk & Control (IBRC)

IBRC is a critical and growing part of Citi, focused on identifying, measuring, monitoring and mitigating the key risks impacting our Institutional Clients businesses, including our lending, banking and services organizations as well as the functional groups who support them, and leveraging data to understand and articulate potential issues and trends.

Leveraged Portfolio Group (LPG)

LPG is an integral part of Citi's credit approval and origination process for Leveraged Finance transactions, as well as ongoing credit monitoring framework for Citi's Leveraged Finance Portfolio of client relationships, both Sponsor-backed and Corporates. LPG plays a critical role in the ongoing evaluation of the clients' financial health and credit profile, allowing Citi to effectively manage its exposure against clients with highly leveraged credit structure.

Citi Commercial Bank

Looking to master the art of client relations and start a rewarding career with Citi? Look no further than our Commercial Bank, which offers you the opportunity to develop your skills as an integral part of our team supporting our clients.

Markets

Have a talent for making the complex simpler? Our Markets team works with sophisticated and diverse financial offerings to serve organizations equally as unique. You'll be challenged daily and gain a wide range of professional skills and experiences.

Commodities

The Commodities business falls under the Citi's Markets division, and we are a top global Commodities bank. Our capabilities include trading and marketing commodities and commodity derivatives in power, natural gas, and crude oil and oil products.

Equity Research

Here you will be able to contribute to providing expert analysis on a span of disciplines.

Public Finance

Public Finance investment bankers work closely with city, state, and local governments as well as municipal authorities to raise capital for an array of public-use projects.

Quantitative Analysis

Join our industry-leading professionals as thought leaders on complex subjects and assist traders and clients in pricing, hedging, and structuring of securities, and provide critical information and advices for managing risk across all market trading units.

Sales & Trading

Our Sales & Trading team work with sophisticated and diverse financial offerings to serve institutional clients looking to enter and exit financial positions.

Securities Services

Securities Services leverages our local and global strengths in execution, our comprehensive custody, clearing and fund servicing capabilities to meet our clients' needs.

Treasury and Trade Solutions

Considering a career that will constantly challenge you? Our industry-leading Treasury and Trade Solutions team will help you develop your professional abilities by streamlining solutions such as cash management, trade services and finance solutions for companies across the globe.

Global Spread Products Financing and Securitization

Global Spread Products Financing & Securitization (GSP F&S) provides innovative capital solutions to a broad range of clients ranging from corporates, asset managers, institutional investors, governments and non-profits across the credit, municipal and securitized markets. GSP F&S is comprised of fifteen businesses who engage in traditional Investment Banking strategies (managing client relationships and helping to develop strategic and tactical capital plans) along with asset-based financial structuring and targeted capital markets activities including syndication and distribution.

Why Citi

We're always on the lookout for great talent. At Citi, learning and self-development is integral to our culture and you can expect to continue to be challenged every day â it's how we make progress. We take a hands-on learning approach to support your growth and learning.

Experience

You'll learn everyday by doing client work, analysis and other challenging assignments. Get on-the-job practice and feedback from Citi experts as you hone your skills alongside your peers.

Exposure

You'll have honest, open interactions with leaders of all levels and focus across our company. From networking events to work shadowing, you will have meaningful conversations and experiences every week at Citi.

Education

You'll also have access to our full suite of functional courses and eLearning modules to ensure you have the knowledge you need for success. And when you're ready, we have a whole host of leadership programs and coaching awaiting you.
